ygData.subject: Re: A question for high level bards
ygData.msgSnippet: i doubt it, we are more built for groups.  i have with two other people, i may have been able to with one other person, but not solo. Shada Silverleaf, Level
ygData.messageBody:
i doubt it, we are more built for groups. i have with two other people, i
may have been able to with one other person, but not solo.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 40 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


-----Original Message-----
From: Jones, Brian [mailto:brian.jones@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 1:26 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A question for high level bards


From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>


Is it possible for a level 40 bard to take
out a level 30 griffin without using kite?
